title: Pirate Staff
summaries: The Pirate Staff is a Hardmode, pre-mechanical boss summon weapon. It spawns a pirate minion that attacks enemies by slashing them with a sword. Like other minions, the summoned Pirate is invincible and follows the player for an unlimited amount of time, unless the player dies, summons a replacement minion, cancels the buff, or leaves the world. The Pirate Staff has a 0.1*1/1000 (0.1%) / 0.05*1/2000 (0.05%) chance to be dropped by pirates (except Parrots) during Pirate Invasions, with a 0.4*1/250 (0.4%) / 0.2*1/500 (0.2%) chance from the Pirate Captain. It also has a 6.67*1/15 (6.67%) / 1*1/100 (1%) chance to be dropped by the Flying Dutchman.

Its best modifier is Ruthless. The Mythical modifier provides the widest array of stat bonuses, but these primarily affect the initial summon rather than the resulting minion. Additionally, minions cannot deal critical hits. The only lasting advantage a Mythical Pirate Staff has over a Ruthless one is knockback.
